pages.text: I cannot give it any name . Because I dare not look at it directly.It seems that he will devour me in the next second.

pages.title: Unidentified Substance
pages.text: This is obtained by separating the $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/eroded_ender_pear)eroded ender pearl$() . $(br)  Make sure you put the eroded ender pearl in your pocket . then using $(l:goldens_additions:important_items/charged_gun_powder)charged gunpowder$() . You may separate them,And there is a small chance to obtain a complete final ender pearl.
